death.attack.amethyst_shard.player: %1$s was struck in the chest by %2$s
enchantment.crystalline.amethyst_rain.de: When at full charge, releases a giant sphere wave of amethyst shards in all directions
enchantment.crystalline.shatter_sweep.de: Replaces the 1 shard with a sweep wave of shards
enchantment.crystalline.gravitate.desc: Makes entities gravitate towards you when you smash them
tooltip.crystalline.divider_attack: [ %s ] a entity to charge the divider
tooltip.crystalline.crusher_attack: [ %s ] a entity while falling to release a scatter of crystals
